name: DIMPOCK
description:
DIMPOCK is a procedurally generated rogue-lite set in space, made in 48 hours for Ludum Dare 38.

Fight your way through 9 tough procedurally generated worlds whilst crafting upgrades in preparation for what lies next.

There are 7 unique weapons, 4 different shields, and 3 different thrust modules for a total of 86 possible ship kits!

How to play:

* Use W/A and spacebar to navigate the main menu.

* Use WASD to control your ship, aim with the mouse.

* Left click fires your weapons.

* Number keys 1-5 drop one of the ores in that inventory location.

* Spacebar charges up your interhyperdimensionalleapdrive which propels you into the next level.
